text: T. Visvanatha Pillai Kamalaswamy (21 January 1911 – 25 March 1998) was an Indian politician from the Indian National Congress. He served as a member of the Rajya Sabha from Madras State (now Tamil Nadu) from 3 April 1952 to 2 April 1954 and 3 April 1954 to 2 April 1960. == Family == Kadharsha was born on 6 October 1935 to T. S. Visvanatha Pillai. He married T. K. Saravanai Vadivoo Ammal and had one son and one daughter. == References == * Category:1911 births Category:1998 deaths Category:Rajya Sabha members from Tamil Nadu
title: T. V. Kamalaswamy
